item.title: CVE-2021-36844|2024-09-16T17:42:56.502Z -- mythemeshop -- wp%20subscribe%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in MyThemeShop WP Subscribe plugin <= 1.2.12 on WordPress.
